## 1. Metadata : Its information about deployment or service or pod
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74223025/233339762-1c40203e-8fdd-4f48-bb54-3a8b7a69ec2c.png)

## 2. Specification : 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74223025/233340266-05b2ab9a-fe32-469e-8368-42e96e56562e.png)

## 3. Status : It is automatically generated by k8s and it is stored in ETCD. It continuously monitor the records of running pods and compare it with configuration file. e.g. If status found 2 replicas of any deployments are live however in configuration file it is mentioned 3 replicas, then it will create 1 more replica. This is what we call self healing.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74223025/233340851-5f1a127a-3f59-43cb-bbbe-2bb681405dc6.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74223025/233344534-a6918d48-c133-45c5-9a11-00c4eaa9ea3d.png)
